name: Zf2 tutorial
tagline: Repository for my Zend Framework 2 Tutorial
body:
# About this Repository
This repository contains Example Code used in the Zend Framework 2 Tutorial by V. Rao Research Associates.

## Keywords
PHP, Zend Framework 2, Skeleton Application, Authentication, Social Authentication, Authorization, Zfcuser, HybridAuth, OAuth, ScnSocialAuth, BjyAuthorize,

# ZF2_tutorial
1. Zend Framework 2 Skeleton App.
2. Authentication & Authorization.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
